column4: Just asking again after a while, I've been trying to install quickcam drivers, and I've been able to download and extract the driver, but when I try to compile it I get an error. I have a pastebin link to the log. http://pastebin.com/d5eb1bb33
Nope. I'm new at all this.
check whick kernrel version they support with that module. it looks like it doesn't work with the version you have installed
it says kernel 2.6.20 as the most recent one. Easycam won't install the drivers, it gives errors as well.
